hanzi-su-wiki:
昇

Значения

Подниматься вверх, взбираться

Мнемоника

Подъём солнца 日 подчиняется определённым законам и поддаётся исчислению 升.

Варианты

升, 曻
rtega_mnemonic:
昇昇RSrise, ascent, peaceful, peace
  • rise 升 like the sun 日 over a peaceful landscape
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 升 [ shēng ] to advance; to arise; to hoist, to raise
heisig_keyword: поднимать / увеличивать (зп, что можно измерять) | поднимать / увеличивать (зп, что можно измерять)
heisig_chinese_memo: This hanzi does not mean "get up" or "awake." It means rise up, like the rising of a salary, or a promotion. STORY: You know that your salary has risen up when your measuring box has enough dollar bills in it to reach the sun.
heisig_constituent: rise up, sun, day, measuring box, thousand, drop, ten, needle
heisig_story: Our image here is made up of two primitive elements: a sun and a measuring box. Just as the sun can be seen rising up in the morning from - where else - the Land of the Rising Sun, this kanji has the sun rising up out of a Japanese measuring box - the "measuring box of the rising-up sun."
koohiiStory1: This kanji does not mean "get up" or "awake." It means rising, like the rising of a salary, or a promotion. STORY: You know that your salary has RISEN UP when your MEASURING BOX has enough dollar bills in it to reach the SUN.
koohiiStory2: We Measure the Sun to decide when we should Rise Up out of bed.
jp_example_words:
上昇(じょうしょう): rising, ascending, climbing
昇進(しょうしん): promotion
昇る(のぼる): to arise, to ascend, to go up
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You want to go to the sun so you set up a slide twenty stories tall so you can ascend into the heavens.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel the air whoosh past your face as you shoot off the end of the long slide and ascend into the air. It's starting to get hot and the sun is getting closer!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to ascend into the sky and toward the sun because the Shougun (しょう) said so. He's testing out some space travel technology (the twenty story slide) and you're his guinea pig.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: As you ascend, look back through tear-filled eyes and see the Shougun staring up at you. He nods slightly. You've pleased him.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 十 (десять), 廾 (двадцать), 日 (день)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you can measure (升) the sun (日) as it climbs
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This hanzi does not mean "get up" or "awake." It means rise up, like the rising of a salary, or a promotion. STORY: You know that your salary has risen up when your measuring box has enough dollar bills in it to reach the sun.

昇字的起名意思

：一般指上升，向上，提高；本义为容器名，同“升”。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
Rise
Source glyph
Rise
Name meaning
: Generally refers to ascending, upward, and improving; the original meaning is the name of the container, which is the same as "rise".
shēng
вм. 升
Radicals: 日, 丿, 廾  (sun, slide, twenty)
Meaning Mnemonic
You want to go to the sun so you set up a slide twenty stories tall so you can ascend into the heavens.
Feel the air whoosh past your face as you shoot off the end of the long slide and ascend into the air. It's starting to get hot and the sun is getting closer!
Reading Mnemonic
You need to ascend into the sky and toward the sun because the Shougun (しょう) said so. He's testing out some space travel technology (the twenty story slide) and you're his guinea pig.
As you ascend, look back through tear-filled eyes and see the Shougun staring up at you. He nods slightly. You've pleased him.
